name: Wanted (tomeyro)
description:
When the most perfect human, on your eyes, is yourself. When you get lost in your own gaze. When you stop at every mirror you pass. You love yourselves, we get it, but you can sometimes hurt people without knowing.

In Wanted you play as a character that, due to their vanity, lost their lover, who also cursed them with the power of attraction. But, like, extreme atraction. Everyone will want you, and you need to scape, because if someone gives you love and you reject them, you'll become a monster!

----

Built for the Kenney Jam 2020 - #KenneyJam
